channel.title: CVE Feed for ArmorX -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ArmorX -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-3922|2024-08-04T07:52:19.964Z -- armorx -- lisomail
item.description: LisoMail, by ArmorX, allows SQL Injections, attackers can access the database without authentication via a URL parameter manipulation.

item.title: CVE-2024-4303|2024-06-04T17:55:11.592Z -- armorx -- armorx%20app
item.description: ArmorX Android APP's multi-factor authentication (MFA) for the login function is not properly implemented. Remote attackers who obtain user credentials can bypass MFA, allowing them to successfully log into the APP.

item.title: CVE-2024-4303|2024-08-01T20:33:53.173Z -- armorx -- armorx%20app
item.description: ArmorX Android APP's multi-factor authentication (MFA) for the login function is not properly implemented. Remote attackers who obtain user credentials can bypass MFA, allowing them to successfully log into the APP.
